Description: Gold ear-ring: S-shaped hook with a globule soldered at one end; the other end is in the form of a loop with a gold bead soldered above and a pendant club attached to a twisted wire.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Curium
Bibliographic references: Jewellery / Catalogue of the Jewellery, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum. (2376)
Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p. 83, Tomb 81 no. 1; pl. XIII, fig. 22)
